downloadMessage_windows.message: Download iCloud for Windows to use iCloud Passwords.

downloadMessage_macos.message: This extension requires macOS Sonoma to be installed.

extDescription.message: iCloud Passwords lets you fill passwords from iCloud Keychain when signing in to websites using Chrome.

CheckEngineMessage.message: Enable Passwords in iCloud for Windows to use iCloud Passwords with Chrome.

unsupportedOS_windows.message: This extension is designed to run on Windows 10 or later. If you are using a Mac, your passwords will automatically sync with your iPhone, iPad and Mac when you sign in to iCloud.

divPINMessage_windows.message: iCloud for Windows sent you a notification with a verification code. Enter the code to continue.

divPINMessage_macos.message: A verification code has been generated by your Mac. Enter the code to continue.

divICsMessage.message: Choose a saved password to use:

GenericPopupTitle.message: Your passwords are synced with iCloud Keychain

divNoPasswordsMessage_windows.message: You can view and edit saved passwords in the iCloud Passwords app.

divNoPasswordsMessage_macos.message: You can look up and manage saved passwords in Passwords settings.

divNoPasswordsMessage_macos_12.message: You can manage saved passwords in the Passwords pane in System Preferences.

divNoPasswordsMessage_macos_11.message: You can manage saved passwords in the Passwords tab of Safari’s preferences.

divDoNotRememberTitle.message: You previously indicated to never save passwords for this website.

divDoNotRememberMessage.message: To change this, remove the entry for this website from your iCloud Keychain and log in to this website again.

enableAutoFillPasswordsMessage.message: Click the toolbar button to enable the iCloud Passwords extension for Chrome.

enableInPageAutoFillCheckboxDetail.message: Allow iCloud Passwords to offer credentials from an in-page list. You can always fill passwords from the iCloud Passwords toolbar button, even if this option is turned off.

allowExtensionToControlAutoFillDetail.message: To prevent Chrome’s in-page AutoFill from interfering with iCloud Passwords, iCloud Passwords can attempt to turn off the browser’s AutoFill settings on your behalf.

strongPasswordSuggestion.message: You can create a strong password in Passwords Settings or in Safari.
